categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Mike Cottrell is an actor who played an Ewok warrior in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
Cottrell also appeared in such films as Flash Gordon and History of the World: Part One.
It appears that Mike is wearing the Romba costume, however this Ewok as already been attributed to Debbie Lee Carrington.
